title: Did not receive Order icon, but got chaos (screenshot included)
body:
I came to understand you receive both (at least my friends did). I received the chaos icon, but not the order one

Screenshot to prove: https://imgur.com/a/rfSsV

yes I restarted the client.

replies.body: I double checked and it looks like your Dawnbringer Riven Icon finally came through! She's been running a little slow today, but she's getting around to everyone eventually!
Thanks for the update! I'll check it out
Having the same issue, how long did it take for other people who did not have it right away for it to show up?
I relogged, waited for a bit, then said screw it and played an aram with the chaos icon. The order icon was there by the time the game finished.
The same is happening to me.
Never mind it apeared magicaly after a while
